basic.floral_language:
Rieger begonia 
Floriography: happy, gentle, calm
Rieger begonia has clustered huge flowers with beautiful and vivid colors, very charming. The flowers are a symbol of wealth and good fortune, together with Peony, represent "rich full house" Often used for interior decoration or flower beds.
Rieger begonia likes warm sunshine with a natural flowering time from April to June, for a period up to 2-3 weeks, and will blossom again in September to December with a good semi-dormant period in summer.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-June and September-December, September-December, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Flower color white, peach red, orange

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes moderate light, avoid strong direct light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased, dead leaves and withered flowers timely
